alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 11:29AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds are expected on north to south oriented roadways and will be especially dangerous for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
